characterInfo.Family: Lopen (cousin), Chilinko (uncle?), Lopen's Mother (aunt?), Huio (cousin?), Rod (cousin?)

characterDescription:
Punio is one of Lopen's cousins who appears to join Bridge Four. He is the first of said cousins to be noticed by Kaladin.
Originally a member of Roion's army, he swore to Kaladin for his cousin, Lopen. He'd heard Lopen's mother say that Lopen's cohort needed more guards and so came to help. Lopen got him a uniform amongst other things.
